thread.section_title: The Bridge Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: HOTEL WELL SPENT
thread.title_full: HOTEL WELL SPENT - Review of The Bridge Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mark Lawrence C
title: HOTEL WELL SPENT
text: We came to this hotel march 2017. Reception was really welcoming and entertaining. The place was very good for the price. Even though we were three sharing one room it was very spacious. I would recommend this to anyone. The hotel was near to 2 stations so every location in london is easily accessible. The breakfast was also good and cheap.
